newsitem.title: UK: Homeloans sets 448.4 mln stg mortgage-backed FRN. [CORRECTED 15:55 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Homeloans sets 448.4 mln stg mortgage-backed FRN. [CORRECTED 15:55 GMT]

text.p: Homeloans Plc has issued a four-tranched mortgage-backed FRN for a total of 448.4 million stg, lead managers ING Barings and J.P. Morgan said.
The two banks are joint lead managers on class A1, A2 and B notes, and J.P. Morgan is sole lead manager on class C notes.
BORROWER HOMELOANS (NO 3) PLC
CLASS A1 NOTES
AMT 135 MLN STG BASE 3M-LIBOR AVERAGE LIFE 1.1 YRS
MOODY AAA MARGIN *6.25 BP ISS PRICE PAR
FULL FEES 10 BP MGT/UND 7.5 BP SELL CONC 2.5 BP
NOTES *STEPS UP TO 20 BP FROM OCTOBER 1998 WHEN THERE IS A
CALL AT PAR
CLASS A2 NOTES
AMT 252.05 MLN STG BASE 3M-LIBOR AVERAGE LIFE 4.8 YRS
MOODY AAA MARGIN **14 BP ISS PRICE PAR
FULL FEES 20 BP MGT/UND 12.5 BP SELL CONC 7.5 BP
NOTES **STEPS UP TO 45 BP FROM OCTOBER 2002. THERE IS A CALL
AT PAR FROM OCTOBER 1999
CLASS B NOTES
AMT 30.1 MLN STG BASE 3M-LIBOR AVERAGE LIFE 5.7 YRS
(Lead managers correct average life from 5.8 years to 5.7 years.)
MOODY A2 MARGIN ***35 BP ISS PRICE PAR
FULL FEES 30 BP MGT/UND 20 BP SELL CONC 10 BP
NOTES ***STEPS UP TO 75 BP FROM OCTOBER 2002. THERE IS A CALL
AT PAR FROM OCTOBER 1999
CLASS C NOTES
AMT 31.25 MLN STG BASE 3M-LIBOR AVERAGE LIFE 5.7 YRS
(Lead managers correct average life from 5.8 years to 5.7 years)
MOODY BAA3 MARGIN ++80 BP ISS PRICE PAR
FULL FEES 45 BP MGT/UND 30 BP SELL CONC 15 BP
NOTES ++STEPS UP TO 175 BP FROM OCTOBER 2002. THERE IS A
CALL AT PAR FROM OCTOBER 1999
COMMON TERMS:
LEGAL MATURITY OCTOBER 2028
LISTING LONDON SALE LIMITS US/UK GOV LAW ENGLISH
NEG PLG NO CRS DEFLT NO FORCE MAJ IPMA 2
-- London Newsroom +44 171 542 8863
